_title: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act
detail: Legal guarantee for one hundred days of employment in every financial year to adult members of any rural household willing to do public work-related unskilled manual work at the statutory minimum wage of Rs. 120 per day in 2009 prices.

_title: Members of Parliament Local Area Development Scheme
detail: Each MP has the choice to suggest to the District Collector for, works to the tune of Rs.5 Crores per annum to be taken up in his/her constituency. The Rajya Sabha Member of Parliament can recommend works in one or more districts in the State from where he/she has been elected.

In 2014–15, an allocation of Rs. 25 crore is made for the scheme.

_title: Sabla or Rajiv Gandhi Scheme for Empowerment of Adolescent Girls
